CustomField.description: Formula field used in email templates to the Product Manager to display whether the Technical Update checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( Technical_Update__c, "Additional Technical Information has been requested, please create a task and assign it to Angie Johnson. Select Sales Enablement - ICB as the task type and subject. Please attach a mockup of what is required.", ".")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: System Maintained Field: Used in email templates to display whether the Technical Update checkbox field is checked or not.
CustomField.label: Technical Update Verbiage ProdMgr
